abstract: BNP Paribas suspended operations of three funds over concerns about the drying up of credit.
snippet: BNP Paribas suspended operations of three funds over concerns about the drying up of credit.
lead_paragraph: PARIS, Aug. 9 — The French bank BNP Paribas suspended operations of three of its funds and the European Central Bank injected cash into the financial system, both in the wake of turmoil in the United States mortgage market.

byline.original: By James Kanter and Julia Werdigier

abstract: Stocks dropped sharply as soon as trading opened today after a French bank, BNP Paribas, suspended operations of three of its funds in the wake of turmoil in the American market for home loans.
snippet: Stocks dropped sharply as soon as trading opened today after a French bank, BNP Paribas, suspended operations of three of its funds in the wake of turmoil in the American market for home loans.
lead_paragraph: Stocks dropped sharply as soon as trading opened today after a French bank, BNP Paribas, suspended operations of three of its funds in the wake of turmoil in the American market for home loans and the European Central Bank and the Federal Reserve injected cash into the financial system because of tightening credit markets.

headline.main: Stocks Tumble as French Bank  Reacts to Home Loan Worries
